attributes.text:
@dev Initializes the state of the trading bot; meant to be called by a trading bot
 @param param Value of the indicator's parameter

@dev Updates the indicator's state based on the latest price feed update
 @param latestPrice The latest price from oracle price feed

addTradingBot(uint256).details: Initializes the state of the trading bot; meant to be called by a trading bot

editPrice(uint256).details: Updates the sale price of the indicator; meant to be called by the indicator's developer

params.newPrice: The new sale price of the indicator

getHistory(address).details: Given a trading bot address, returns the indicator value history for that bot

returns._0: uint[] Indicator value history for the given trading bot

getName().details: Returns the name of the indicator

getPriceAndDeveloper().details: Returns the sale price and the developer of the indicator

returns._0: (uint, address) Sale price of the indicator and the indicator's developer

getValue(address).details: Given a trading bot address, returns the indicator value for that bot

returns._0: uint[] Indicator value for the given trading bot

update(uint256).details: Updates the indicator's state based on the latest price feed update

params.latestPrice: The latest price from oracle price feed
